text: Milojko Spajić (Pljevlja, 24 September 1987) is a Montenegrin politician and financial engineer serving as the Prime Minister of Montenegro since October 2023.Izabrana 44. Vlada, Spajić očekuje pun mandat He also served as Minister of Finance and Social Welfare in the Government of Montenegro and the Cabinet of Zdravko Krivokapić from 2020 to 2022.Montenegro Elects First Government Without Djukanovic Party Spajić is the president of the centrist party Europe Now. As of 2024, he is the fourth youngest serving head of state in the world, after France's Gabriel Attal, Burkina Faso's Ibrahim Traoré and Ecuador's Daniel Noboa. He graduated from Osaka University, Saitama University and HEC Paris.Qui est Milojko Spajić ? == References == Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:Prime Ministers of Montenegro
title: Milojko Spajić
